newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Bahrain 91-day t-bill rate falls to 5.49 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bahrain 91-day t-bill rate falls to 5.49 pct.

text.p: The average yield at this week's tender for 10 million dinars of 91-day Bahrain treasury bills fell to 5.49 percent from 5.53 percent a week earlier, a spokesman for the Bahrain Monetary Agency said on Monday.
The average price climbed to 98.630 from 98.620 last week and the minimum price accepted was 98.630.
Banks submitted bids for 18.2 million dinars worth of bills, down from 27.4 million dinars the previous week.
The bills are offered on Monday and issued on Wednesday.
